1.content: Enhance InvestPro website with advanced microinteractions
1.details: Add sophisticated hover effects, smooth transitions, loading animations, scroll-triggered animations, interactive buttons, form feedback, and other engaging microinteractions throughout the website

2.details: Optimize typography, contrast ratios, whitespace, visual hierarchy, navigation flow, mobile responsiveness, and overall user experience for maximum readability and usability
